DeviceProperties.ServiceActionsScripts: [{"ActionDefinition":{"Name":"Reset GW","NumericParameters":null,"BoolParameters":null,"EnumParameters":null},"Script":"modbusw(SH,6000,uint16,1)"},{"ActionDefinition":{"Name":"Set Slave ID","NumericParameters":[{"FriendlyName":"Slave ID","Abbreviation":"SID","IsFloat":true,"MinValue":1.0,"MaxValue":255.0}],"BoolParameters":[],"EnumParameters":[]},"Script":"modbusw(SH, 65221, uint16, SID);\r\n\r\nmodbusw(SH,6000, uint16, 1);"},{"ActionDefinition":{"Name":"Turn On - all lamps","NumericParameters":null,"BoolParameters":null,"EnumParameters":null},"Script":"modbusw(SH, 530, uint16, 0xFE)"},{"ActionDefinition":{"Name":"Turn Off - all lamps","NumericParameters":null,"BoolParameters":null,"EnumParameters":null},"Script":"modbusw(SH, 530, uint16, 0x00)"}]
